name: Yogurt Lemon Chicken and Feta Salad
ingredientLines: 1 ¼ Lbs. Chicken breasts (3 chicken breasts, each cut into 3s)
1 tsp Mediterranean sea salt (or a mix of dried oregano and sea salt)
2 bags of spring lettuce or greens of your choice
Optional: sun flower seeds and avocado for toppings/mix ins
Optional: sun flower seeds and avocado for toppings/mix ins
1½ Lbs Chicken breasts (3 chicken breasts, each cut into 3s)
2 Cans (14.5 oz each) Diced tomatoes (with basil garlic and oregano)
1 Lb Pasta of choice (I use fettuccine or spaghetti)
1.5 lbs Chicken Tenders (or cut up chicken breasts)
1 Tsp True Botanica True Life Sea Salt
4 tbs Gluten Free breadcrumbs (I used something called 'Chicken Coating Mix)
Salt, pepper, oregano (about ½ tsp of each)
Salt, pepper, oregano (about ½ tsp of each)
Salt, pepper, oregano (about ½ tsp of each)
1.5 cup rice (I just happened to have a white rice on hand, but i'm sure brown rice would be great with this as well)
